properties.body:
STRAIT OF OTRANTO.
GREECE TO ITALY.
FIVE METER VESSEL, WHITE HULL, 20 PERSONS ON BOARD,
DISABLED AND ADRIFT BETWEEN CORFU (39-40N 019-45E)
AND ITALY. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A
SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC ROME,
INMARSAT-C: 424744220, PHONE: 39 065 908 4527,
39 065 908 4409, FAX: 390 6592 2737,
3906 5908 4409, E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
